name: A DARK TOWN
description:
! IMPORTANT: You must use the 'EXAMINE' command to look at objects - 'LOOK' may only give you the room description! You can abbreviate 'EXAMINE' to 'EX' for speed !

This text adventure for MS DOS was made in one day for Adventure KAJAM and DOS GAME JAM. It's a little buggy, but I don't think there's anything serious enough to prevent you finishing the game. Let me know if I'm wrong!

The windows version is identical but bundles DOSBox for some added convenience.

Version 1.1:

Added ingame hint for using 'EXAMINE'

Removed one unwinnable situation

Corrected some typos

Added flower
